name: Python
content: I am proficient in Python and have used it extensively for backend development, data analysis, machine learning projects, and building RESTful APIs with FastAPI. I am familiar with libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn.

name: JavaScript
content: I have strong expertise in JavaScript, using it for frontend development with ReactJS and Next.js, as well as server-side scripting with Node.js. I have implemented responsive web applications, state management with Redux, and RESTful/GraphQL APIs.

name: Java
content: I have a solid foundation in Java, having built scalable backend services using Spring Boot. I am experienced in developing microservices, designing REST APIs, and working with Hibernate for database interactions.

name: TypeScript
content: I have experience with TypeScript, primarily for building type-safe, scalable web applications with frameworks like ReactJS and Node.js.

name: C/C++
content: I have intermediate-level skills in C and C++, focusing on algorithms, data structures, and system programming. I am familiar with STL and multithreading techniques.

name: HTML/CSS
content: I have extensive experience with HTML5 and CSS3, creating responsive designs and optimizing user interfaces. I am skilled in CSS-in-JS libraries, Styled Components, and preprocessors like SASS.

name: MySQL
content: I have used MySQL for relational database management, writing complex queries, and ensuring optimized database performance in various projects.

name: ReactJS
content: I have expertise in ReactJS, using it to develop interactive UIs, single-page applications, and progressive web applications. I have integrated state management with Redux and created reusable components for scalability.

name: Next.js
content: I have experience with Next.js for server-side rendering and building performant, scalable web applications.

name: Node.js
content: I have a strong background in Node.js, building server-side applications, RESTful APIs, and real-time applications.

name: React Native
content: I have experience building cross-platform mobile applications with React Native, focusing on performance optimization and native integrations.

name: Spring Boot
content: I have built scalable backend services and microservices using Spring Boot, implementing features like authentication, database interaction, and REST APIs.

name: FastAPI
content: I have experience using FastAPI to build high-performance, asynchronous RESTful APIs for web applications.

name: GraphQL
content: I have experience working with GraphQL for API development, enabling efficient querying and integration into web and mobile applications.

name: MongoDB
content: I have extensive experience with MongoDB, using it for developing REST APIs and building prototypes. I am familiar with Mongoose for Node.js and PyMongo for Python.

name: PostgreSQL
content: I have strong experience in managing PostgreSQL databases, writing advanced queries, and optimizing performance in complex systems.

name: Snowflake
content: I have experience using Snowflake for data warehousing and large-scale data processing, focusing on query optimization and ETL pipelines.

name: AWS
content: As an AWS Certified Developer Associate, I have hands-on experience deploying scalable applications, working with services like EC2, S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and creating CI/CD pipelines.

name: Google Cloud
content: I have experience with Google Cloud, deploying applications, managing storage solutions, and configuring Kubernetes clusters.

name: Kubernetes
content: I have used Kubernetes to orchestrate containerized applications, manage clusters, and scale deployments efficiently.

name: Algorithms
content: I have strong knowledge of algorithms, including sorting, searching, graph algorithms, and dynamic programming, which Iâ€™ve applied in real-world problem-solving.

name: Object-Oriented Programming
content: I have extensive experience in object-oriented programming, designing scalable, reusable code structures across Python, Java, and TypeScript.

name: Microservices
content: I have expertise in building microservices-based architectures using Spring Boot and FastAPI, ensuring scalability and high availability.

name: Design Patterns
content: I am proficient in applying design patterns such as Singleton, Factory, and Observer to create clean and maintainable code.

name: Git
content: I am proficient with Git, using it for version control, branch management, and collaborative development in team projects.

name: Jira
content: I have used Jira extensively for project management, issue tracking, and agile sprint planning.

name: Agile Methodologies
content: I am experienced in agile methodologies, participating in sprints, standups, and collaborative development to deliver iterative solutions.

name: Maven
content: I have experience using Maven for dependency management and building Java projects in Spring Boot environments.

name: MVC
content: I have implemented MVC architectures in web applications, ensuring modular and scalable codebases for both frontend and backend solutions.
